Why Choose Lone Star Financing?

Close on Time

Our goal is to close every loan in 28 days or less. In-house underwriting, processing, and closing for fast approval and on-time fundings.

Low Rates & Fees

Waco, TX Lender with Low Mortgage Rates. FHA, VA, and USDA Approved Lender.

Customer Service

Local Waco service and provide top-notch customer support. We will be with you at every step from application to closing.

Lone Star Financing— Your local mortgage company

  • Local Waco Lender – Low Rates & Low Fees
  • Our Goal is to Close All Loans in 30 Days or Less
  • Local underwriting and processing 
  • No-Obligation Loan Estimate
  • Waco, TX Customer Service

Mortgage Lenders in Waco, TX

Buying a new home in Waco, TX? Lone Star Financing specializes in new home purchases and mortgage refinance.  We offer a bevy on mortgage programs including:  moonlight FHA Loans, VA Home Loans and USDA rural home loans in Waco. Whether a new home purchase or a mortgage refinance we have you covered. Lone Star Financing is a privately held independent mortgage banking company providing mortgages to borrower’s through all kinds of markets, all the while forging long lasting relationships. Lone Star Financing is a forward-thinking lender with modern technology with a common sense approach which puts the borrower first. Our end goal is simple, to exceed all clients expectations. For you to be only “satisfied” falls short of our goals. We want you to say, GREAT JOB! Lone Star Financing wants to be your trusted mortgage lender in Waco not just for this one mortgage loan but for life. We want to offer a new mortgage lending experience; find out why more people are choosing Lone Star Financing as their preferred Waco mortgage lenders.

  • Direct Mortgage Lender with Low Rates & Low Fees
  • Local underwriting and closing for fast approval & funding
  • No-Obligation Good Faith Estimate
  • Local moonlight customer service


What makes Lone Star Financing different? Competitive rates, personal attention, a variety of mortgage products and fast and easy pre-approvals. Low mortgage rates, low fees and fast closings are our mortgage company motto and why more Waco borrower’s are choosing Lone Star Financing as their preferred mortgage lenders in Waco, TX. Call us today to visit: (855) 868-8825

Waco, TX Real Estate Market (2022)

Waco, TX Real Estate Snapshot – There are currently 602 homes for sale in Waco, TX at an average listing price of $252000. Including 152 houses in the pre-foreclosure or bank-owned stages of the foreclosure.  View all homes for sale in Waco, TX. 

What our Waco Customers  are saying -“Lone Star Financing had great communication through out the entire process and worked to make sure everything went as smooth as possible. I would highly recommend them to any person in Waco looking for a home loan. Excellent customer service!” Kathy

Why More People are Choosing Us? It's Our People!
